general_rules.learning_time: Square of ritual level in weeks
additional_notes: Rituals that benefit the recipient can only be cast onto the sorcerer themselves unless otherwise stated
Many call for necessary ingredients, but may only require blood and concentration
Good teacher or a good grimoire may lessen the time needed to learn a ritual
It is possible to create new rituals through an extended test that may take in game months to complete

level_1.name: Astromancy
level_1.effect: Learn information such as Skills, Desires and Convictions about someone
level_1.additional_notes: If you know the correct Birth or Embrace date, you can add 1 die to the Ritual pool. This does not stack if you know both.

level_1.name: Beelzebeatit
level_1.additional_notes: Nothing prevents directed or controlled creatures from entering.

level_2.name: As Fog on Water
level_2.additional_notes: This can be ended early or kept to allow them to walk on water for the rest of the night.

level_2.name: Calling the Aura's Remnants
level_2.effect: Speak with the residual aura of someone who has died
level_2.additional_notes: The aura only has memories up to the time of death.

level_3.name: Bladed Hands
level_3.effect: Sharpens the user's hands into a weapon
level_3.additional_notes: Treated as a light piercing Brawl weapon with a +2 modifier.

level_3.name: Blood Sigil
level_3.effect: Create a tattoo on a Kindred which also contains a message
level_3.additional_notes: Can read the message with a Resolve + Occult roll or by Sense the Unseen (Auspex ●). Caster can remove the Blood Sigil by spending Willpower and touching the tattoo.

level_4.name: Compel the Inanimate
level_4.effect: Give a simple command to an inanimate object which it follows a few minutes later
level_4.additional_notes: The caster must remain in the same general area as the object. Sense the Unseen (Auspex ●) can detect the caster with a Wits + Auspex vs. caster's Composure + Blood Sorcery roll.

level_4.name: Defense of the Sacred Haven
level_4.effect: Protect a haven with mystical darkness from the sun
level_4.additional_notes: The Ritual roll is made once the sun rises.

level_5.name: Antebrachia Ignium
level_5.additional_notes: The user is only resistant to fire on their arms.
level_5.source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 67

level_5.name: Atrocity's Release
level_5.additional_notes: Can be resisted with a Resolve + Blood Sorcery test.

elemental_chain.description: Chain of Elemental Grasp, Tiamat Glistens, and Elemental Attack
elemental_chain.effect: Creates a natural disaster (e.g. Tornado, Magma Flow or Tsunami)

land_chain.description: Chain of Land's Sustenance, Compel the Inanimate, and Fisher King
land_chain.effect: Gain complete control over the land and heal 5 Aggravated damage each night
